body.p: Is This a Picture of Mohamed?
Something woke me up at 5:30 this morning.
This week Canada's Government is going to consider
an Anti-Islamophobia Motion M103 in Parliament
Before that happens, I have some things to say.
Holy Man whose Every Word and Action was Correct
I ask Muslims worldwide: Can I say anything else?
On the week, Canada's government is going to
discuss anti-Islamophobia motion M103 in parliament.
I ask Muslims in the West: Can I say anything else?
I ask Muslims in Canada: Can I say anything else?
I ask Iqra Khalid, sponsor of M103 in Canada: Can I say anything else?
Is This a Picture of Mohamed?
Where do I cross the line?
This Is a Picture of Christ
This Is a Picture of Mo
This Is a Picture of Mo
This Is a Picture of Moses
This Is a Picture of Mo
This Is a Picture of Mo
Is This a Picture of Mohamed?
This might be a Picture of Mohamed
When do I become Salman Rushdie?
I'm a Westerner. I am Salman Rushdie.
When do I become a Danish Cartoonist?
When do I become Charlie Hebdo?
So that we're not trapped in the dead past
in the embrace of the corpses of the past.
Every Westerner is a Danish cartoonist.
Where is she going to stand?
on the week of anti-Islamophobia motion 103 in Canada...
on the week of anti-Islamophobia motion 103 in Canada...
on the week of anti-Islamophobia motion 103 in Canada...
who sponsored the motion after the murders in Quebec City
On the Week of Anti-Islamophobia Motion 103 in Canada
This is a picture of the prophet Mohamed?
Is This a picture of Mohamed?
Is This a picture of Mohamed?
